creator: rory.douglas@na.sunchem.com
text:
When using the Admin web-app to add <resource-link> elements, the webapp 
would "add" 3 elements for every 1 that I configured. I checked in server.xml, 
and only 1 <resource-link> was added, as well as a spurious <resource> element 
(spurious because I was linking to a global <resource>)

It works fine for me.  The admin webapp correctly adds <resource-link> 
elements.  No duplications of <resource-link> elements.
creator: amyroh@apache.org
